channel.title: Sci Fi on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Sci Fi on Butterfly Dream

item.title: A Brief History of Star Wars Canon
item.description: Star Wars has always had a special place in my heart. I write and tweet about it a lot. Maybe too much. Nah! After I had devoured the movies over and over again as a kid, I was left hanging. I wanted more. I wanted the Episodes I-III (OK maybe in hindsight I should have been careful what I wished for!), and there was nothing. I am sure it was much worse for the people for whom Star Wars had been a part of their lives since the late 70’s and 80’s.
